alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Estill; Johnson; Lee; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 9:53PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky, northeast Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following areas, in east central Kentucky, Elliott, Estill, Menifee and Powell. In northeast Kentucky, Johnson. In southeast Kentucky, Lee, Morgan and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 952 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Liberty, Irvine, Campton, Henry, Lewis, Ravenna, Maytown, Toliver, Gosneyville, Valeria, Murphyfork, Stoll, Ezel, Pomeroyton, Trent, Hazel Green, Calaboose, Stillwater, Pekin and Rexville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Elliott; Estill; Johnson; Lee; Menifee; Morgan; Powell; Wolfe
